alert.note: Alert for Bates (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 5:56PM CDT until May 08 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN BATES COUNTY... At 556 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Appleton City to near Rich Hill to 7 miles southwest of Butler, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Butler, Rich Hill, Rockville, Foster and Worland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: These storms are producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
